clubs.name: Teddington Cricket Club
clubs.description: One of the oldest and most prestigious cricket clubs in Surrey, established in 1867. Home to multiple senior XIs, thriving colts section, and a vibrant social scene. We welcome players of all abilities from juniors to veterans.
clubs.address: Bushy Park Sports Ground, Sandy Lane

membershipTypes.name: Senior Playing
membershipTypes.description: Full playing membership for adults 18+. Includes all league and friendly matches, net sessions, social events, and bar privileges. Selection for 1st, 2nd, 3rd, and Sunday XIs.

membershipTypes.name: Junior Playing
membershipTypes.description: Full playing membership for players under 18. Includes colts training, age-group matches, and pathway to senior cricket. Supervision required for players under 11.

membershipTypes.name: Student
membershipTypes.description: Discounted playing membership for full-time students aged 18-25. Must provide valid student ID. Includes all playing privileges.

membershipTypes.name: Family
membershipTypes.description: Perfect for cricket families! Includes 2 adult playing members and up to 4 junior playing members. Best value for families with multiple cricketers.

membershipTypes.name: Social
membershipTypes.description: Non-playing membership with full social privileges. Access to clubhouse, bar, and social events. Perfect for supporters, retired players, and cricket enthusiasts.

membershipTypes.name: Vice President
membershipTypes.description: Premium social membership supporting the club. Includes VIP seating at matches, exclusive VP events, complimentary match teas, and recognition in club publications.

membershipTypes.name: Life Member
membershipTypes.description: Honorary membership awarded for exceptional service to the club. Granted by committee approval only. Includes all privileges in perpetuity.

membershipTypes.name: Veteran
membershipTypes.description: Discounted playing membership for players 60+. Includes selection for veteran XIs and social cricket. Full bar and social privileges.

venues.name: Main Ground - Bushy Park
venues.description: Historic first-class standard cricket ground with excellent facilities. Hosts all 1st XI and major matches. Beautiful setting adjacent to Bushy Park with mature trees and traditional scoreboard.
venues.facilities: Sightscreens, Electronic scoreboard, Boundary rope, Pavilion viewing, Hospitality marquee

venues.name: Practice Nets
venues.description: Four all-weather practice nets with artificial surfaces. Available for booking by members throughout the season. Bowling machine available.
venues.facilities: Artificial wicket, Bowling machine, Ball storage, Protective netting

venues.name: Indoor Training Centre
venues.description: Modern indoor facility with two lanes for winter training. Climate controlled with video analysis equipment. ECB-approved coaches available.
venues.facilities: Two indoor lanes, Video analysis, Bowling machine, Coaching equipment, Changing rooms

venues.name: Pavilion & Clubhouse
venues.description: Traditional cricket pavilion with bar, changing rooms, and function space. Perfect for match teas, social events, and private hire. Licensed bar with real ales and full catering.
venues.facilities: Licensed bar, Kitchen, Function room, TV screens, Changing rooms, Showers, Committee room

venues.name: Nursery Ground
venues.description: Second ground used for 2nd XI, 3rd XI, and colts matches. Excellent facilities for development cricket and junior fixtures.
venues.facilities: Scoreboard, Small pavilion, Practice area, Parking

fees.name: Senior Playing Membership - Annual
fees.description: Annual membership fee for senior playing members (18+)

fees.name: Junior Playing Membership - Annual
fees.description: Annual membership fee for junior playing members (under 18)

fees.name: Family Membership - Annual
fees.description: Annual family membership (2 adults + up to 4 juniors)

fees.name: Match Fee - Senior
fees.description: Per match contribution for senior players

fees.name: Match Fee - Sunday
fees.description: Per match contribution for Sunday friendly matches

fees.name: Bar Levy
fees.description: Annual bar levy for playing members

fees.name: Private Coaching - 1 Hour
fees.description: One-to-one coaching with ECB qualified coach

fees.name: Club Kit - Playing Shirt
fees.description: Official club playing shirt with logo

fees.name: Guest Player Fee
fees.description: Fee for non-members playing as guest

fees.name: Late Payment Surcharge
fees.description: Surcharge for membership fees paid after deadline

recurringSchedules.title: Senior Net Practice
recurringSchedules.description: Weekly net practice for all senior playing members. Come along and work on your batting and bowling with club coaches available to provide guidance.

recurringSchedules.title: Thursday Evening Nets
recurringSchedules.description: Additional net session focusing on match preparation. Ideal for players selected for weekend fixtures to fine-tune their skills.

recurringSchedules.title: U15 Colts Training
recurringSchedules.description: Weekly training for Under-15 age group. ECB-qualified coaches run structured sessions covering all aspects of the game. Parents welcome to watch.

recurringSchedules.title: U13 Colts Training
recurringSchedules.description: Weekly training for Under-13 age group. Focus on fun, skill development, and match play. All equipment provided.

recurringSchedules.title: U11 All Stars Cricket
recurringSchedules.description: ECB All Stars program for young players aged 8-11. Fun introduction to cricket with games and activities. All equipment provided.

recurringSchedules.title: Winter Indoor Nets
recurringSchedules.description: Indoor training during winter months. Book your lane and maintain your skills throughout the off-season. Bowling machine available.

recurringSchedules.title: Women's Cricket
recurringSchedules.description: Weekly session for women cricketers of all abilities. Friendly, welcoming environment with coaching support. New players always welcome!

recurringSchedules.title: Veterans Social Cricket
recurringSchedules.description: Relaxed cricket for over-60s. Emphasis on enjoyment and gentle exercise. Followed by refreshments in the clubhouse.

sessions.title: Pre-Season Training
sessions.description: Intensive pre-season session focusing on fitness and skills. Essential preparation for the upcoming league campaign.

sessions.title: 1st XI Practice Match
sessions.description: Practice match for 1st XI squad ahead of cup tie. Selection trials for available places.

sessions.title: Colts Fielding Masterclass
sessions.description: Special coaching session focusing on fielding skills. Learn catching, throwing, and ground fielding techniques.

sessions.title: 2nd XI Net Practice
sessions.description: Dedicated nets session for 2nd XI players. Focus on team preparation for upcoming fixtures.

sessions.title: Spin Bowling Workshop
sessions.description: Specialist session with guest coach. Learn leg-spin, off-spin, and variations. Suitable for all ages.

sessions.title: Wicketkeeping Clinic
sessions.description: Specialist wicketkeeping session covering stance, footwork, and catching. Bring your own gloves.

sessions.title: New Members Induction
sessions.description: Welcome session for new members. Meet the committee, tour facilities, and learn about club activities.

sessions.title: Girls Cricket Session
sessions.description: Dedicated cricket session for girls aged 8-16. Fun, friendly environment with female coaches.

sessions.title: Fast Bowling Masterclass
sessions.description: High-intensity session for pace bowlers. Focus on action, speed, and accuracy with video analysis.

sessions.title: Father & Son Cricket
sessions.description: Fun cricket activities for fathers and sons. Build skills together in a relaxed environment.

events.title: 1st XI vs Richmond CC - Surrey Championship
events.description: Crucial home league match against local rivals Richmond. This fixture always draws a great crowd. Bar and BBQ available. Come and support the 1st XI!

events.title: 1st XI vs Hampton Wick - Cup Quarter Final
events.description: High-stakes cup match at home. Win this and we're in the semi-finals! All members encouraged to attend and support.

events.title: Colts Festival Day
events.description: Annual festival for junior cricketers. Inter-club matches, skills challenges, and prizes. BBQ lunch included. Family members welcome.

events.title: Annual Cricket Dinner & Awards
events.description: Black tie dinner celebrating the season's achievements. Player awards, guest speaker, three-course dinner with wine. Dress code: Black tie.

events.title: Club Quiz Night
events.description: Test your cricket and general knowledge! Teams of 6. Prizes for winners. Fish and chip supper included. Fully licensed bar.

events.title: AGM - Annual General Meeting
events.description: Important meeting for all members. Review of 2024 season, financial report, election of officers, and plans for 2025. Your voice matters!

events.title: Summer BBQ & Family Day
events.description: Annual family celebration! BBQ, bouncy castle, face painting, and T20 match. Bar open all day. Children's activities and games.

events.title: President's XI vs Chairman's XI
events.description: Traditional end-of-season friendly match. Mixed teams with players from all XIs. Fun, social cricket at its best!

events.title: Coaching Workshop - ECB Level 2
events.description: ECB Level 2 coaching course hosted at the club. Open to club members at discounted rate. Gain your coaching qualification!

events.title: VP Lunch & 1st XI Match
events.description: Exclusive Vice President lunch with champagne reception, three-course meal, and prime viewing for 1st XI match. VP members only.

events.title: Club Tour to Devon
events.description: Annual cricket tour! 3 days of cricket in beautiful Devon. 2 matches, accommodation, and social activities included. Limited places.

events.title: Fundraising Race Night
events.description: Exciting race night to raise funds for new nets! Bet on virtual horse races, enjoy drinks, and support the club. Great prizes!

competitions.name: Surrey Championship Division 2 - 2024
competitions.description: Our 1st XI competes in Surrey Championship Division 2. Home and away fixtures throughout the season. Come support the team!

competitions.name: Internal T20 Competition
competitions.description: Fun internal T20 tournament. Four teams randomly drawn. Evening matches with BBQ and bar. Trophy for winners!

competitions.name: Surrey Cup 2024
competitions.description: Knockout cup competition open to all Surrey clubs. Win and progress to the next round. Dream of a cup final at The Oval!

lineItems.description: Club Tour to Devon - Final Balance
